description:
Must See explanation of Viruses. (It's been about 5 months since I first posted this and it's more relevant now then ever.)

Below caption courtesy of @friendsoftruth 🙌

Being bombarded with propaganda from the mainstream media it’s easy to think you’re all alone in wanting some basic truth. The good news is you’re not alone.

There are lots of courageous souls who have dedicated their lives to sharing their truths.

From doctors with decades of experience to extraordinary ‘ordinary’ people who have found a lie they spend every day helping to uncover, there are so many truthers who, like you, just want the truth.

We have learnt so much from all these magnificent humans and highly recommend you seek them out on your journey of truth, discovery and, ultimately, love.

Because we all know that truth is love. And vice versa.

Get some truth today from:

Ali Zeck, Dr. Andrew Kaufman, Biba Tanya, David Icke, Dr Judy Mikovits, Dr Thomas Cowan, Karen Brewer, Jeff Berwick, Jason Christoff, Sacha Stone, Pete Evans and Kelly Brogan MD.
